word:
MR No. 1517 - Dedication of Paradise Valley Sanitarium; Results of the San Francisco Earthquake; Defense of the True Sabbath

     (Written May 12 and 26, 1906, from Sanitarium, California, to Edson and Emma White. Portions appear in Manuscript Release No. 285.) 


     I address you a few lines this morning. I have begun letters to you during the past few weeks, but have been unable to finish them.
